title: Unchained Love
overview: The story revolves around the youngest daughter of the Bu family, Bu Yin Lou entering the palace in the place of her elder sister and a palace romance ensues.When eunuch Xiao Duo helped the crown prince to ascend to the throne, the female lead who should have been buried together was rescued. They got along well. In the process of gradual interaction, they gradually developed true love and the story thus unfolded.Â
